title: Best of The Herd for Apr 27, 2020
itunes:title: Best of The Herd for Apr 27, 2020
description:
The Packers sent a message to Rodgers that they've given him plenty to work with

The Patriots deserve an F for their entire off-season

Phil Jackson is still underrated for all he did with the Bulls

The Eagles drafting Jalen Hurts makes a lot of sense

Where Colin was right, where Colin was wrong


Guest: Roy Williams, North Carolina Head Coach shares some great Michael Jordan stories 


Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
